Articles.Content:
Hello.

I would like you guys to share to me some of your modern military vehicles. This includes Humvees, APCs, Tanks, Boats, Carriers, Fighter jets, VTOLs, And much more.

So, the year is 1997. It is a war between Germany and America. Make sure to build German vehicles, And American vehicles.

The mods you need to use are: Airplaneplus, And bdarmory. No other mods can be used other than those mods.

Good luck!

Edited February 24, 2020 by siklidkid

()

 

Edited February 24, 2020 by siklidkid

On 2/23/2020 at 7:14 PM, siklidkid said:

Hello.

I would like you guys to share to me some of your modern military vehicles. This includes Humvees, APCs, Tanks, Boats, Carriers, Fighter jets, VTOLs, And much more.

So, the year is 1997. It is a war between Germany and America. Make sure to build German vehicles, And American vehicles.

The mods you need to use are: Airplaneplus, And bdarmory. No other mods can be used other than those mods.

Good luck!

Can we know the details of why Germany is at war with America? Did the fascists come back? Did German reunification end up favoring the East? Did America change ideologies somehow so that war with west/reunified Germany was likely?

 

I just don't see how the point of divergence could be more recent than like the 1960s or something.

Edited March 16, 2020 by Pds314

Actually, I changed it around a little. After the breakup of yugoslavia, The countries of yugoslavia are seeking revenge. Germany, Poland, And france have teamed up with them, And they have declared war on russia and america.

The United Kingdom teams up with America And russia, And so does finland, norway, sweden, And denmark.

If you do need more detail, tell me.
JV-3B Main Battle Tank is the backbone of Hermia's National Army's Armored Forces.
